item.title: EP 255 - "We All Have To Make Sacrifices."
item.itunes:title: "We All Have To Make Sacrifices."
item.description:
Today we go to Brazil to meet a beautiful woman/headless mule, and then we investigate the tragic murder of Cassie Jo Stoddart.

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Headless Mule

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headless_Mule

 

The legend of the Headless Mule

https://vimeo.com/33925575

 

Lost for Life - Full Movie | Snagfilms

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iX0BYhGRIx4

 

Murder of Cassie Jo Stoddart - Tape of Brian Draper and Torey Adamcik

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXRYxhN_Rg0

 

Murder of Cassie Jo Stoddart

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_of_Cassie_Jo_Stoddart

 

These Teens Wanted To Kill Their Friend - And Their Plan Was Something Straight Out Of The Movies

https://www.ranker.com/list/cassie-jo-stoddart-murder/jacob-shelton

 

Supreme Court upholds Adamcik's sentence, releases transcripts of video made by killers

https://www.idahostatejournal.com/members/supreme-court-upholds-adamcik-s-sentence-releases-transcripts-of-video/article_d1fe0af6-5082-56d8-a7e6-bfb31de13844.html

 

STATE v. DRAPER

https://www.leagle.com/decision/inidco20110913153

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
